mapper.select: select userID as id, userPass as pass, userName as name, userEmail as email, userRank as rank, commentFlag, regdate from user where flag='Y' and userID= #{id} and userPass = SHA2(#{pass},256)
select count(userID) as cnt from user where userID =#{id}

select.if: select userID as id,userName as name,userEmail as email,userRank as rank,commentFlag,writeFlag,loginFlag from user where userID like concat('%',#{q},'%') order by regdate desc limit 10 offset ${p}
select userID as id,userName as name,userEmail as email,userRank as rank,commentFlag,writeFlag,loginFlag from user where (levenshtein(userName, #{q}) <= 2) order by regdate desc limit 10 offset ${p}

mapper.select: select userID as id, userName as name, userRank as rank from user where userID = #{id2};
select userID as id, commentFlag from user where userID = #{id};
select userName as name, userRank as rank from tbl_board tb, user where tb.writeid= user.userID and tb.writeid=#{ut};
select tb.id, tb.boardid, tb.title, tb.content, tb.regdate from tbl_board tb, user where tb.writeid= user.userID and tb.writeid=#{ut};
